description:
Feature: To test all the feature of manage admins page
  As an user of the application
  I want to test various functionalities of Manage Admins page
name: To test all the feature of manage admins page

elements.description:
Description for 1) loginSuccess - To verify the successful login to the application with DATA Login_Success
Input Data: [[bishnu.das@sakhatech.com, Password@123], []]
elements.name:
1) loginSuccess - To verify the successful login to the application with DATA Login_Success
Input Data: [[bishnu.das@sakhatech.com, Password@123], []]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON home page
2. When I CLICK login link
3. Then I am ON login page
4. And I ENTER valid login details
5. And I SUBMIT the form
6. Then I am ON dashboard page

elements.description:
Description for 1) To verify 'Manage Admin' link from bread crumb menu from View Profile page with DATA AddAdmin_Success
Input Data: [[Rohit, Kumar, Singh, rohit.kumar@test.com, 1, Welcome@123, Welcome@123, 1, 1], [success_message]]
elements.name:
1) To verify 'Manage Admin' link from bread crumb menu from View Profile page with DATA AddAdmin_Success
Input Data: [[Rohit, Kumar, Singh, rohit.kumar@test.com, 1, Welcome@123, Welcome@123, 1, 1], [success_message]]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON dashboard page
2. When I CLICK leftMenuButton link
3. And I CLICK manageAdmins link
4. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
5. When I CLICK addAdmin link
6. Then I am ON addAdmin page
7. And I ENTER all the required fields
8. When I SUBMIT the form
9. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
10. And I CLICK lastOfItemsPerPage link which displays all the admins created in a single page
11. And I VERIFY addedAdminDisplayed
12. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
13. When I PERFORM clickOnAdminName to view Admins Profile details
14. Then I am ON adminViewProfile page
15. Then I CLICK manageAdminBreadCrumb link
16. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
